website_summaries.verdict: A rucksack-inspired bag perfect for customers needing a larger main compartment with additional, easy-access storage.
pros: Offered in a variety of different patterns and colors
Detailed with faux leather for a sleek look
cons: Many customers complained of the straps ripping under heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This Burton Backpack is great! I love the floral design. It's not too over-the-top and not too subtle either. It's unisex and goes with just about everything. I've gotten so many compliments. I'm in college so it mainly holds my laptop, pens, and some notebooks/textbooks, but even with all that I can still fit so much in here, very roomy. It holds up extremely well and after two months of heavy use still looks and feels brand new. Burton makes amazing bags and luggage and I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Grayson Burke

customer_reviews.title: Daily commute
customer_reviews.text: My daily commuter, I've had it for a couple months. Take the train to Boston everyday and love it. Solid, durable. It has three pockets inside, one for laptop (with a separate zipper on the side, which is my fave feature for quick access to my laptop) and one for papers or somethin. The third pocket is mesh. The outside pocket is just open- I use it to keep quick acess stuff like my work badge. Inside I use a cable organizer for electronics, makeup bag and wallet to keep it organized. Solid backpack and in my experience better than hershel.
customer_reviews.author: Batman

customer_reviews.title: looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Get compliments on the looks of this backpack all the time. Its cool looking and holds quite a bit, but functionally it is not the best. the top loading looks cool and retro, but really, a bag that has zippers is much easier to load and unload.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Best decision to buy this one. It's not to big also for a small girl. Nice on the back. Enough space and the laptop space is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Different designs are not all made equal.
customer_reviews.text: I Like: The colors. Looks unique without being abrasive. The design; minimal, nice, roomy enough for stuff. The straps and placement. Lifetime Warranty. I dislike: The durability. This bag is VERY thin and I'm scared any hiking trips or heavy books would tear it so I've resorted to using it as my laptop bag which is unfortunate. Unsure if this is a knock off but I don't think so which is why I'm still giving it the good review. Hopefully the warranty holds up its needed.
customer_reviews.author: pawsondemand

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this backpack. I'm not typically a backpack kinda girl, but needed something light and roomy for travel. It hasn't made its first trip yet, but I've taken it around town and it's perfect. Nicely lightweight with well-padded straps, and a large main compartment. I haven't put my laptop in the special pocket yet, but it'll fit fine if I need it to. There's a small zippered pocket and one bigger netted pocket. And the color! Love the blues with the yellow and red. It's bright and cheerful as well as useful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I love burton backpacks
customer_reviews.text: Ended up choosing this over a hershel backpack for travel. Glad I did! Really high quality and looks good. Perfect overnight bag and great as a carryon for airplanes. I chose the light blue on dark blue and it’s even better looking in person. Cost was much less than other high quality bags. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this backpack
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack. I have been looking for a couple years for a backpack that doesn't feel overwhelmingly big on me (I'm 5'2'') but can also fit a decent amount- with a laptop sleeve and handy compartments. AND one that is comfortable to wear. This checks all the boxes, and looks great. Quality all around- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for broken backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to replace a broken one, and so far I'm really liking it. There was light rain today and the bag was fairly water resistant (see photos). The laptop sleeve is just large enough to hold a laptop 10" long and 14.5" wide. The material used in the backpack feels durable, but the bottom seems to be made up of softer material than the sides. The backpack is made in Vietnam. I will be making periodic updates to track the durability of the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Considering that 14% of luggage has something stolen or goes missing I was very glad these served their intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: These babies are larger than they look but they are the exact size they are marked out to be. Not only that, but though they are large and fit a lot of stuff, they did not look too large for our 5'0 bodies. I bought a few of these, one for each traveler, for a 23 day trip through Europe and we managed to pack everything we needed perfectly well and have no check-in luggage. Considering that 14% of luggage has something stolen or goes missing I was very glad these served their intended purpose, and are cute to boot!!
customer_reviews.author: Aggressively Ok

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack for school
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this back is the extra mesh pocket on the inside. When I put stuff in it like my calculator or inhaler it makes it hard to get my notebooks in. However the side pocket for laptops is very nifty.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Munro

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this bag. I've had it for 6+ months and it's holding up very nicely. It's perfect for the amount of travel I do and is a great all around bag for anything from hiking to day trips to overnights. It's also super attractive and I get a lot of compliments on it when I use it. I'm super obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T

customer_reviews.title: Good carry on item
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used this backpack a few times as a carry on item. Really like the easy access to the laptop thru the side zipper. Doesn't have much shape to it unless the backpack is full, but thats not a big deal. Dealing with the drawstrings is probably the only downside of the backpack. I never really anticipated how much easier a simple zipper might be.
customer_reviews.author: Darvillamarvil

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality -- strap ripped.
customer_reviews.text: It looks attractive, but the strap ripped almost completely off after 1 month of normal use as an everyday book bag. I complained to Burton, and sent the bag back to them for repair. They never acknowledged receiving the bag back. Then, when I complained again that they never even let me know it had been received, they sent me a brand new bag. The new bag has now had several months of use, and the strap is again ripping in the same place. These bags are defective -- a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia D. Hurewitz

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I bought. The plastic straps on the first one started to fall apart after 5 years, but it’s still functional. The rest of the pack is still holding together though, most backpacks I’ve bought usually only last 2-3 years before the bottom falls out. I’ve only used it for school so I’m not sure how well these hold up for more rugged use. The built in laptop sleeve is really nice, it fits my 16” laptop easily.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and bike rides.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to travel to Paris with minimal luggage and bought this backpack for the trip. I was able to fit so many things in there (the key here was to roll the clothes) and it help up great! I also use this for long bike rides and can fit in a change of clothes, snacks, a large Nalgene, and my bike lock. The back zipper is convenient if you're trying to get something out there quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and handsome backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pack. I received it yesterday and have only had a limited chance to test it out, but I honestly can say that the build quality and attention to detail is very high. The materials used for my model are excellent and feel really great to the touch. The colors and designs are well thought out, with a lot of attention to detail.
customer_reviews.author: D. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great design and Space
customer_reviews.text: Great design and comfortable even with a lot of textbooks. I used it this whole semester and I was able to fit my laptop, 3 textbooks, notebooks, cables, and a sweater comfortably. Did not put so much weight on my shouders. Pretty waterprrof too. I would put my backpack on the ground when the ground was wet and nothing insie of my bad became wet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: _DjBacon

customer_reviews.title: I love the backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love the backpack. The colours are my favorite. It was as expected. I use it every day at college. It has a laptop sleeve compartment and a side zipper that is easily accessible to your laptop. There is also a mesh pocket on the inside. I am excited to use this when I go hiking or whatever. However, after a few uses, the seam at the bottom of the clip strap started to become undone but nothing major. I would recommend this to everyone. On a side note, if you have a short torso, I would not get it. I have a short torso and although I love this backpack, sometimes its bother some because I am so short.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great. It’s a perfect size for pretty much whatever you need to use it for. I use it for travel and school and it works super well. This backpack is not only super functional, it also looks really really good, and stylish. I’d recommend this backpack to anyone, it is more than worth the price. Overview: This backpack has a medium sized pocket on the top which comes in handy, it also has a mesh pocket on the inside, a padded laptop sleeve, and another sleeve like thing that you could use for books or paperwork (or anything you can really fit inside of it). In all, I’d highly recommend this backpack to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: A great multi purpose pack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for school. Can fit my laptop, charger, binder, and notebook in there with no problem. Also good for travel, I can pack clothes and extras in it and easily carry it or bring it though the airport. A great day pack for a trip through the city too. It can do it all!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: You'll Never Need Another Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Literally cannot think of anything to dislike about this bag! IT'S AMAZING. It's able to pack so much and expand to accommodate with its double - drawstring closure under the buckle flap. I've used it backpacking (light overnight), photography, hiking, commuting on my bike, and almost daily for college. I recommend this bag so highly! Gets a lot of compliments too!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Backpack, Especially for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the other reviewer was talking about. At the $16.00 I paid it was an absolute steal. If a company charged $120.00 for this bag, I am sure folks would be praising its quality. The materials are all very durable, stitching is straight and heavily reinforced, zippers work well, and the bag is very well designed. With the exception of the faux leather patches, I could easily see paying a lot more for this bag. Burton produces great stuff in my experience. I feel like I made off like a bandit for getting this as cheap as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Scruff

customer_reviews.title: Really minimal, clean, better than other backpacks.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop sleeve is great for easy to access laptop. One thing however, it is kinda janky to get your folders and whatnot out of the bag, given that it has a ziptie style opening, helps to keep it all the way open at all times. However, this is a minor inconvenience, the bag is super durable, easy to carry, and looks nice. Great for college!
customer_reviews.author: Freddy Degwood

customer_reviews.title: Great daily work and travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this bag for months and love it's functionality and style. Perfect laptop bag for work and also carry-on for trips (did a week in Colombia and California with just this bag). Meets the carry-on size requirements and fits a very surprising amount of clothing/goods. So far its help up perfectly with the beating I've been giving it! Would recommend especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jones Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Great book bag decent spaces has a divider and several small pockets inside my only complaints is no side pockets to hold a water bottle or something not a big deal tho I should’ve noticed
customer_reviews.author: Armando Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Small and Compact
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of smaller than I thought. The fabric doesn't have much stretch in it. My laptop fits nice and snug so that is a plus and it is easy to get it out from the side of the pack. However, I think it is difficult to get things in and out of the main compartment. This is a stylish pack, but I think I would opt for a easier opening bag next time.
customer_reviews.author: CharlotteH

customer_reviews.title: It was comfortable enough to tote and wiped up clean
customer_reviews.text: My husband used this pack on a 2 week trip through the Pacific Northwest. It returned after miles of hiking through mountains, along the coast, in the rainforest, through wineries, and cities looking pristine. It was comfortable enough to tote and wiped up clean. And it kept his laptop (15" MacBook) safe, too.
customer_reviews.author: M Beck

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag for work and it’s been great so far. There are a few internal pockets but it’s mostly one big pocket as shown in the pics. I will update after I take it camping/hiking later this month if anything changes but I’m super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: candace

customer_reviews.title: Right size, good material, so tacky it fits me perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Warning! can't get my 15 inch laptop through the side pocket! However I love this bag! 1 hunting trip, a few hiking trips, camping trips and no stains! Keeps everything dry, 2 big rain storms with this thing on my back! Completely stuffed it still meets size requirements for a carry on bag. This has become my go to bag from brush hunting to carry on. Its one of a kind! Tacky yes, hunting colors yes, and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S

customer_reviews.title: Good Price Good Durability Water Resistant Looks Great Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good Price Good Durability Water Resistant Looks Great Cons: Could be better divided, but for large amounts of stuff this works great Summary: Good backpack. I'd definitely buy from BURTON again.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color. It looks European. I've been asked several times where I got this. The only thing it doesn't have is a water bottle holder on the outside. The top gray pouch can be used as a purse. Very comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Packed to the top as a carry-on and used as a day pack Packed and unpacked so many times Held up to the abuse Will use many more times for travel
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, unless you are devoted to Burton products
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this pack is intended to look cool, and be for city dwellers only. Nonetheless, it's not waterproof, is made of chintzy fabric with questionable stitching, and has little functionality to it.
customer_reviews.author: Julia C.K

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so much! It is perfect for when I travel. I use it for camping, as my carry on when I am traveling, or just to pack a bunch of stuff for whatever I am doing. I love all of the pockets, the chest strap helps with support and the side zipper for my laptop is SUPER handy when I have to get to my computer multiple times when going through security in airports and what not. Bag is awesome and will buy another Burton backpack for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made a really impressive gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my 19 year old son and he LOVES it! Overall it is very well crafted with lots attention to detail, fine stitching, the material feels rugged/durable. It's quite roomy and large inside, somehow holds a LOT while keeping a sleek minimalist profile. We both love the goldenrod color, it's earthy and neutral but really pops with the rich tall accent straps. He's 6 ft tall and it adjusts to fit him perfectly, just right in torso length, looks proportional on.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten lots of compliments over the past 4-5 years I have owned this. I only with it had a waterbottle holder
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BAG
customer_reviews.text: This print is so fantastic and the material is heavier than I thought, which was a pleasant surprise! I very much love this bag and I use it every day for work. I would highly recommend this bag! I was able to squeeze my 18" laptop in the laptop pouch. It was an incredibly tight fit, but it still fit (this was a personal laptop, and I just wanted to see if it would fit). I use this for my work computer which is a 16" screen and it fits absolutely perfect. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Linette R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Rucksack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for traveling on flights. I used this as a carry-on and the separate zipper on the side made it a breeze to remove my laptop for the TSA. The main compartment has separate laptop, tablet, and netted pockets. The top lid is quite spacious and will fit an 8 inch tablet comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Used as a carry-on and day pack Packed to the top Held up to abuse Will use many more times
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've used this bag for almost a year and still going strong. Never had an issue. I bought the waxed canvas one and I've even used it on the rain. So far very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as displayed
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color as pictured. Image displayed is tan, but the bag I received is green. Theres a weird discoloration on the straps as well. Aside from that it is a very good quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack missing external pockets
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack- holds tons of stuff, perfect for overnight trips, literally held overight clothes, groceries, work laptop, personal laptop- this backpack does it all. Only complaint- external pockets would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Fizzy

customer_reviews.title: Decent backpack/looks sturdier in pictures
customer_reviews.text: I like this backpack, but the pics make it seem sturdier than what it is...or that the material is more of a canvas. This is thinner material. I ordered the Dijon yellow/blue strap variation and it’s much brighter in person as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Villa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite backpack for over all use
customer_reviews.text: Great for laptops, Travels, hikes, and grocery shopping. Medium size bag that doesn't look bad empty, and looks great semi packed.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: better backpack elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: no bottle holder -1 stars not enough shoulder padding -1 star. not a lot of features for the price
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Has padded laptop spot which fits my 16in laptop. Plenty of room in the main compartment and additional pouches and pockets to keep things organized. Love the print and style. Decent price for what you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Lurv.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack. Only thing I wish it had were a water bottle holder (and I wish the zip for the pocket on the top flap were at the top and not the bottom of the flap) but for the price I paid and the outstanding quality, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Mattson

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful beast
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what sort of water repellent they use on this pack, But I'm wanting some.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Tcup

customer_reviews.title: Good Pack, no Water Bottle Holder
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, lots of space and nice amount of pockets, the two string design is a nice update to Rucksacks. However, the lack of a waterbottle pocket is disappointing and prevents it from being truly great.
customer_reviews.author: Sol E.

customer_reviews.title: %100 Quality Brand
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Burton bag. An the quality of the brand is worth the price. I used the bag when travelling in Brazil. An always felt confident about the massive amount of items I stuffed inside. The 3 interior pockets are great. I do wish it had a outside pocket. That just means I'll have to buy a different style. Once you see and feel the quality you'll be able to better compare.
customer_reviews.author: jazmine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, big, but is not very safe, because it does not is made to put padlocks.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the backpack is very good, I wasn’t expecting this. I just put my laptop, 4 books, pens, my wallet, and a tripod and it is not even full yet. I like to go hiking and to bring everything in my backpack, so I think this is good. But, it can’t be locked, so if you are going to travel, you need to be careful with your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Camarao

customer_reviews.title: Quite large, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this backpack Pros it is quite large laptop compartment seems sturdy cons not that many small pockets a bit expensive This is a good backpack i haven't had it long enough to comment on longevity Keep in mind that this backpack has a lot of space. for any day to day use, this backpack will have enough space.
customer_reviews.author: Will C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack ever!!!! I used it mainly on my weekend trips when I was studying abroad. I've also used it a few times for school and gotten so many compliments on it. I will definitely be investing in more Burton backpacks in the future. They are comfortable, fit so much without being bulky and super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Fehintola RA

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but needs a water bottle sleeve on the side.
customer_reviews.text: It is well made and I like the material. The storage for the laptop is nice. Two things I would add would be a water bottle sleeve on the side, and some accessory organization.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron O Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Great Pack!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is the most unique backpack ever. It fits me quite well. I love the style of the straps and definitely the overall color of the pack. Ascent Orange!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M. Henkle

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much. Everything about it is awesome from the size to the material to the colors to the durability to the pockets and enclosures and the way it distributes weight.
customer_reviews.author: ilikeit

customer_reviews.title: Wide straps and makes my things light to carry.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, beautiful backpack. Love compartments including for my laptop, weather rain proof and I got many compliments on it. The best backpack I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Myra L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: When compared...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good pack, Just before buying and keeping this pack I purchased one of a different brand but same style. This other pack was tiny...like so small, and a good $50 more expensive... a friend had this pack and recommended it to me...fantastic pack that is reasonably priced, a good size, with well thought out features. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Micah P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband get lots of compliments for this bag. It's big and fits a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Lin

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality but the darker than the picture. So I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: perfect for school and travel
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both school and travel, and love it. It has the ability to hold a decent amount of stuff but isn’t too large to be a book bag as well. It keeps my stuff dry in the rain, and is pretty durable. My only wish is that it had a water bottle holder
customer_reviews.author: Kayla G.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to match mine, which is a full size version Jack Daniels edition. It was the perfect size for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Tyserion

customer_reviews.title: Good size backpack but really needs an additional pocket on ...
customer_reviews.text: Good size backpack but really needs an additional pocket on the lower half or on the side for frequently needed items and water bottle. I really like the print though.
customer_reviews.author: nocturneofsalome

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room in the backpack
customer_reviews.text: Daughter love the style and color. She can use it hiking or as a carryon for the airport
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a backpack destroyer. He's had this one for eight months and it still looks new! Doesn't have too many fancy pockets, but there is a laptop area in the main compartment, another smaller area in front of that, and a zip pouch in the top flap.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Chose 1 star because it was required before moving forward. If I could leave it at no stars I would. What I received was a royal blue burton duffle. Totally not the super cute backpack listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Really neat backpack. Can be used for anything from a commuter bag to a diaper bag. Our family has used it for both and everything in the middle. Really well made and very cool looking.
customer_reviews.author: E. Armijo

customer_reviews.title: Overall quite good.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of inner compartments. Would like to see side pockets for water bottle or quick access.
customer_reviews.author: ChiomaO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but this is a large pack
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but this is a large pack! not for daily stuff...a real pack. had to return, too big for this mom just carrying around kiddo stuff for parks and festivals etc.
customer_reviews.author: D. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: got these for riding our motorcycles and traveling. Super legit quality and comfortable. Perfect space and holds up well. A must have
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh C.

customer_reviews.title: Great style & quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Burton bags, they have awesome compartments and great quality. Will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Junior Pena

customer_reviews.title: Great for carry on or weekend trips
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack! Took it traveling and it works great for a roomy yet small carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this backpack for my daily commute. Fits all my tech kit, laptop, and headphones. I wish it had some compartments to organize much better
customer_reviews.author: Anil Pediredla

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is better looking in person
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is better looking in person. It is so roomy and lightweight. I took it on vacation and got LOTS of compliments. Great value. My entire has their on Burton
customer_reviews.author: Keith Roach

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking, heavy duty backpack. The print is just what I wanted, and the quality is as expected from Burton.
customer_reviews.author: KDG teacher

customer_reviews.title: and she is very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Yes my daughter selected this .... and she is very happy!
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Capacious!
customer_reviews.text: My second one of these. Great back, lots of space, convenient laptop access and great all day pack. Lots of color options too!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Turley

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack!!! I work two night shift jobs and travel a lot, this is my go to bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Salamone

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy pack
customer_reviews.text: Best bag for anywhere I take off to. I can stuff it full and it will not rip.
customer_reviews.author: DeVineBritches

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for brother, dad, or special man
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this bag to my brother for the holidays and he loved it! The pockets are big and the overall construction of the bag is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Overall this is a great day tripping bag
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great day tripping bag. It even works well as an overnight or 2 bag as well. There are nice dividing pockets on the inside to keep laptop and/or banana peels/ orange rinds separate from the rest of your pack. I dig Cheers Mates
customer_reviews.author: RyanK

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking back with 1 big pocket and 2 very ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking back with 1 big pocket and 2 very small ones on the inside. The laptop pocket makes sense because that is generally what I am digging through my bag for in the first place. Burton makes a hell of a bag and competes with some of the other top guys
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bower

customer_reviews.title: The quality was good but it is not as functional as I had ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a lot more bold in color than shown. The quality was good but it is not as functional as I had hoped due to the narrow strap and no a lot of compartments or pockets. Just one big open bag which is great for larger items.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Kwok

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag my son wanted the black one so bad and Amazon has it much cheaper than the stores. Very happy with seller and product
customer_reviews.author: Alexis14217

customer_reviews.title: A bag for everybody
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his pack! (Sometimes too much, lol) It was initially for his sophomore year, school only, but he uses it for everything!
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love using this for my every day work purposes. Plan to use in the fall for a European trip and not worried about quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's actually great on my back, .. a 15" computer fits, but without a sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Yossi

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for most
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had a pouch to carry water, but it's big enough to just put the water in the bag, a great bag though. Carried so my stuff for school and gym class, and sports clothing for practice after school.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good pack
customer_reviews.text: Great pack until I left it in my car in SF and then my car got broken into and it was stolen
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Nice pack.  Easy access.
customer_reviews.text: Great pack at a great price. Love the color combination. Great for clothes as well as groceries.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lappin

customer_reviews.title: Verrrry nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. Stylish, sleek, and the laptop compartment is clutch.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Cute, plenty of room for everything. I use this all the time. And the price was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, functional bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds plenty of items and upper pouch is awesome for travel and accessories that you want easy access to.
customer_reviews.author: Akirsch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I <3 lifetime warranties but it’s really well made so I probably won’t need it
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: BEST BACKPACK IVE EVER OWNED.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best backpack I’ve ever owned! Durable, stylish, dependable. I’ve taken it on so many trips with me and I use it all the time to carry my photography gear too.
customer_reviews.author: StephSants

customer_reviews.title: Style but no substance. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this backpack. It's very attractive but just not well-designed or durable. First of all, it doesn't have any pockets besides the one zipper pocket on the top flap and the interior laptop sleeve. This means that I have no place to organize smaller items like my phone, wallet, keys, pens, snacks, etc. I'm beyond tired of having to fish around the bottom of the bag looking for my things! But worst of all, the straps have started to rip off after only 6 months of use. Very annoyed that I'm searching for another backpack so soon after purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Neurofuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up !!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ! It's a decent sized backpack. Holds everything I need with a cool slot for a laptop. It's pretty stylish so it can used in any setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Shields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this backpack all around the world and it hasn't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Twan

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! Ive had it for a year and a half and its still in great condition, I love all the hidden compartments esp. the laptop one in the back. The color is true & its very comfortable. Beautiful bag... I need another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Burton Tinder Backpack with Padded Laptop Compartment
product_meta.description: Please click here for packing ideas All Burton bags are backed by a lifetime warranty. After a hard day of igniting the mountain with advanced shredding skills, gather your goods and roll with the Tinder Pack from Burton®. Spacious main compartment can hold all the necessities for a day on campus or the mountain. Padded laptop compartment for safety, security, and easy accessibility. Rucksack style main entry with drawstring closure. Zippered internal mesh pocket for additional storage options. Brushed faux suede detailing. Waist and sternum strap for secure use. Grab handle on top of bag. Materials: 600D full dull vintage inspired oxford weave poly. Padded laptop compartment: [16.5in. x 10in. x 1.5in]. Imported. Measurements: Laptop Compartment: 17 1⁄4 in Bottom Width: 12 in Depth: 6 in Height: 18 in Strap Length: 33 1⁄2 in Strap Drop: 14 in Handle Length: 8 1⁄2 in Handle Drop: 3 1⁄2 in Weight: 1 lb 10.4 oz
